Name: Beats Fever
About the game: Beats Fever is a VR rhythm game where players enjoy stylish music and catch incoming notes. With licensed tracks from renowned music agencies, easy and intuitive gameplay, high quality graphics and immersive environments, this title is for players of all age groups. Highlights > Intuitive gameplay - just hit or slide on the notes (orbs)! > 3 beautiful and exciting metropolitan stages > 30 licensed music tracks of varied types > Fine-tuned timelines and move patterns > Replay and challenge your scores! It is a drum & dance arcade game experience in VR, with polished graphics, energetic music, astonishing body moves, and endless fun!
